name: Burn The Slimes
description:
Welcome to Burn The Slimes!

This project was made in Unity, for the "Project Revival Jam 2".

You play as a pyromancer that needs to defend himself against myriads of slimes!

Burn them in rhythm by using the directional keys, and take care of their type!

Green and blue slimes won't die against your base fire, so use the S and D keys to switch your fire color!

For this project, I had the joy of making all the assets and music by myself.

Have fun!

// Known Bug //

Level is sometimes one beat too late on the WebGL build.

Please restart by using the pause or game over screen for solving the bug.
